level.text: 206.1 Each supervisor shall evaluate every employee in writing:
After ninety (90) days and at the end of an initial review period of six6) months for each new employee;
At the end of an initial review period of ninety (90) days for each employeeho is transferred or promoted to a new position; and
At least once each year thereafter.
206.2 At the supervisor’s discretion, an employee may be evaluated at anyime.
206.3 At the end of a new employee’s initial review period, theupervisor may, with the approval of the Vice President, extend the initialeview period.
206.4 If a new employee fails to complete the initial review periodatisfactorily, the Authority may terminate his or her employment.
206.5 The President and Chief Executive Officer may give a lump sum bonusayment and/or salary increase to eligible employees who have demonstratedxemplary performance.
